name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 18, Nanning, Guangxi. Villagers protested against the developer of Xuefu Tiandi for failing to pay rent and demanded the return of the village's collective land and property.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 20, a blogger said that he complained on his Weibo account that he wanted to kill everyone who owed him money.
The next day, the police in his registered place called him, and the police in his place of residence came to his house to inquire about the situation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, this article is blocked.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/fm7IcdaQfI

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 20, the owners of Zhengzhou Sunac Central China Grand View Phase II collectively signed a notice of refusal at the gate of the community because they opposed the forced delivery of the property without government acceptance.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 15, in Guilin, Guangxi, the owners of the Ubud Courtyard protested that the developer had not issued the property certificate eight years after they bought the house.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The "Father of Digital RMB" was expelled from the party and removed from public office for using mathematical currency to trade power for money.
On November 20, the official website of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission announced that Yao Qian, former director of the Digital Currency Research Institute of the People's Bank of China, former director of the Science and Technology Supervision Department of the China Securities Regulatory Commission, and former director of the Information Center, was expelled from the party and removed from public office.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Are you still using digital RMB now?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 16, in Shangqiu, Henan, the owners of Tianhu Shangpin put up banners to protest the inadequate property services.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 12, in Quanzhou, Fujian, the owners of Blue Ocean International put up banners demanding the handover of their properties.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 15, in Qingdao, Shandong, homeowners of Heda Xingfucheng residential complex protested against the unfinished construction of the building.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 15, Zhuhai, Guangdong. The boss of Wenrunde Company in Sanzao Town, Jinwan District, fled, and workers held banners to protest the company's arrears of millions of wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Starting from November 9, villagers of Pugobu Village, Engebei Town, Ordos, Inner Mongolia gathered in the fields, eating dry food, guarding their land day and night to stop the construction. It is reported that the local town government sold the collective land of the village to enterprises without the consent of the villagers. In order to obstruct the protest, the local police issued a notice to collect clues, encourage reporting, and claim to severely punish the ringleaders and active participants.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 21, Qibao, Shanghai. Due to long-term wage arrears, workers were forced to resign. Workers of Guoli Company took to the Husong Highway to block the road to defend their rights.
Afterwards, the police began to disperse and arrest some of the workers who blocked the road.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some netizens posted videos to defend their rights, saying that Shanghai Qibao Guoli Leather Company owed wages to migrant workers and forced employees to resign on their own.
According to a circulated announcement, Guoli Company is willing to give special "generous treatment" to old employees with more than three years of service who voluntarily resign, including "compensation" of three months of the local minimum wage.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 14 (Release), Taizhou, Jiangsu. A villager in Hubei Village, Xinghua City, was pushed and shoved by village cadres for refusing to pay the management service fee for the fish pond. It is reported that after the villagers paid the fee last year, they did not receive any invoices or receipts, and no one came to manage or provide technical services.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 4, in Xi'an, Shaanxi, the residents who were relocated gathered in front of the Weiyang District Supervision Department to demand rent for their shops. It was reported that the villagers had been promised 25 yuan per square meter per month, but they had been owed 18 months of rent. After this request, the villagers finally received two months' rent.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 13 (Release), Huaihua, Hunan. Residents of Hongyuan Village, Lufeng Town, Xupu County protested against the construction of a sewage treatment plant above a groundwater source and clashed with construction workers. It is reported that the sewage treatment plant is located in an unused soil pit, 197 meters away from the villagers' drinking water source.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to the video footage from the scene, the police tried to carry away a rights-defending worker, and the surrounding workers were shouting, "The police are beating people!" At the end of the video, a group of workers surrounded him and shouted, "Go, go, go!" But no one actually went to help.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The owners reported that there were serious quality problems with Zhongyuan Grand View. According to the on-site rejection notice drafted by the owners, the building lacked a quality guarantee for commercial housing, a housing completion acceptance record form, and a completion certificate. The sewage pipes were not connected, and the heating network and heat exchange station were not built (this is Zhengzhou in the north!). There was serious waterlogging on the roads, and the rainwater wells were in tatters, among many other serious problems.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In July this year, an owner of Jiaqiman Community posted a video to reflect the fire protection problems of the property company, and wrote the fire hydrant inspection card for August on July 30.
Further investigation found that as early as 2021, when the community was delivered, there was news that the community could not be delivered on time due to quality problems. However, the property still collected the property management fee on time, and the owner said at the time that the developer should pay the late payment fee.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The police reported that after the incident, the perpetrator voluntarily surrendered to the public security organs, and the victim who was crushed multiple times has died.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 13 (Released), Zhengzhou, Henan. The owners of Wanhuacheng Yuefu Community protested against the developer for not providing heating for three years after the delivery of the houses.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 21, Qinghai Province issued the "Reward Measures for Reporting Illegal and Harmful Information" to encourage the public to report harmful information online.
Each clue will be rewarded between 50 yuan and 100,000 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 10 (Release), Jinzhong, Shanxi. The owners of the Golden Courtyard community held up banners demanding the establishment of a homeowners committee and the replacement of the property management. The property manager obstructed the process in every possible way and even tried to scam them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of November 21, some citizens discovered that many stone piers had been added to the sidewalks on the Zhuhai coast, and there were patrol personnel holding steel forks and wearing safety helmets.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/CX2utosAn7

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 21, at Yuehua Road in Zhuhai, a car suddenly accelerated and hit pedestrians who were crossing the zebra crossing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 19, in a residential area in Fengzhen City, Inner Mongolia, a man stabbed a person lying on the ground with a knife. A woman nearby tried to stop him several times but to no avail. The murderer has been taken into custody by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 5 (released), Jinan, Shandong. Owners of Poly Longyu Community marched to protest against the developer's reduction of standards and construction quality.
November 10, Hefei, Anhui. Owners of Weixing Park Metropolis Community protested against the developer's deception of consumers and substandard building quality. The owners came to defend their rights, but the developer closed the door and did not respond.
November 7, Cangzhou, Hebei. Owners of Jiahe Yifang Garden Community demanded improvements in greening.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/LIVEjDYzTQ

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, searching for "Zhuhai" on Weibo will not bring up any related terms.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Luo Shuzhong's daughter Luo Canhong posted a recording of her conversation with her father in prison online. In the conversation, Luo Shuzhong was in tears and mentioned the torture he had suffered, "my ears were deafened", "four ribs were broken", "lumbar vertebrae were injured", "handcuffed for more than 140 days, my hands are still numb", she also told her daughter to pay attention to safety, guard against retaliation from officials, and encouraged her daughter to persist in "suing to the end", not only for himself, but also for social fairness and justice.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Ho Kwai-lam, a former Stand News reporter, was arrested and charged with "subversion of state power" for participating in the Hong Kong Democratic Party primary election and was sentenced to seven years in prison on November 19.
"Democracy and freedom never include peace and quiet: real democracy is noisy and noisy. Freedom is to make good choices, to choose and to take responsibility. If you don't think about what you want, it's hard to feel free."
"Behind the narrative of splitting the country and colluding with foreign forces, our real crime to Beijing is that we are not satisfied with getting by in a manipulated election."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 7, Guangzhou, Guangdong. The land of Daling Village was sold to developers without the villagers' knowledge. The villagers gathered to defend their rights and demand the land.
November 8, Dongguan, Guangdong. The villagers of Dalang Town protested against the land acquisition, and a large number of police arrived at the scene to maintain stability.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 15, in Xi'an, Shaanxi, the owners of China Railway Construction Xipai City collectively protested against the developer's cutting corners, which led to the roof leaking.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 5, in Qingdao, Shandong, Jinmao Bay owners gathered to protest against the construction of a hospice near their homes. It is reported that this is a bright spot in the revitalization of the old city in western Qingdao, and the nearby Ferry Bay is about to be upgraded to a 4A-level scenic spot. The owners are worried that the construction of a hospice will affect their living experience.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 18, Yue Xiaoyong, the special envoy of the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs for Afghanistan, said in an interview: The West cannot just focus on the issue of Afghan women. The right to development is also an important human right.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of November 20, in Xinzhou, Shanxi, a vendor fought with a group of police officers and urban management officers, scaring them to flee in a hurry. When the police car backed up, it even hit the trailer behind it. Then the vendor threw a gas can at the law enforcement officers next to him.
Finally, the vendor was taken away by the police.
